title: Can  anybody see my match history through forums please?
body: When i click it,  it says ERROR 404 not found

replies.body: So I've spent about 5 minutes testing this, and it seems to be returning a 404 error for some player's match history (but not others) when attempting to access the full match history through their boards profile. From what I can tell, you should be able to access the full match history through the client by viewing their profile, clicking on the "Match History" tab then clicking on "Full Match History" in the top right (above "Recently Played Champions").
